comments.author: sushobhitg@yahoo.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.2; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.2; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

1) Visit http://www.google.com/finance
2) Login and take a look at some Stock ticker symbols( so as to fill the recent quotes list)
3) Go back to the finance page on the left hand you will see the recent quotes list.
4) Roll mouse over it the it shows bad display text to remove the item

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: sushobhitg@yahoo.com

3) Go back to the finance page on the left hand you will see the recent quotes list.
4) Roll mouse over it the it shows bad display text to remove the item

Reproducible: Always
